text: G치bor Nov치k (14 August 1934 - 5 August 2021) was a Hungarian sprint canoer. He won a silver medal in the C-1 10000 m event at the 1952 Summer Olympics in Helsinki. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympic silver medalists for Hungary Category:Rowers
title: G치bor Nov치k
